formatDescription: Stata is a research data analysis and statistical software package. The DTA format contains the Stata dataset.  Please contact the PRONOM team if you can provide further information about this format.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives

internalSignatures.name: Stata DTA 104
internalSignatures.note:
This signature is based on observation from a range of samples and inference from a later specification for Stata DTA 113. This signature could be improved with a better understanding of the formal specification.

'h' 0x(01|02)=(big|little) endianness filetype (0x01) 0x00 at position 0x03 and 0x09
